# API Surface: hooks

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| platform utilities | module | Cross-platform utilities for process spawning, file locking, JSON I/O, and platform detection | platform.ts |
| session-start hook | hook | Checks scheduled jobs, initializes dashboard cache, cleans legacy state (v1.0.148) | session-start.sh |
| stop-sync hook | hook | Batched external tool sync at session end - processes pending.jsonl events (v1.0.148) | stop-sync.sh |
| cleanup-legacy-state | script | Removes old processor files on session start (v1.0.148 migration) | cleanup-legacy-state.sh |
| scheduler-startup | hook | Checks for due scheduled sync jobs and returns system messages for pending tasks | scheduler-startup.ts |
